Trails.Name: Lower Wanderer, West Meadows, Mike's Way
Old Log Rd, West Meadows, Mike's Way
Sun Bowl, Home Run, 91, Main Base Area

_inspectorSnowReport.Report:
1/28 5:38 AM - With a 1 inch dusting overnight, its time to get up and get ready for yet another stellar day here at Stratton! For your Wednesday, we will be making turns on all 99 open trails, 55 of which received fresh corduroy overnight. For your way up, 9 lifts are scheduled to spin at 9AM with no delays anticipated. Temperatures will stay on the colder side, ranging from 11-15 degrees at the base and 2-6 degrees at the summit, with wind gusts up to 30 mph up top. 

With conditions lining up this well, its a good time to take advantage of a few extra perks. Were offering 50% off lift tickets every Wednesday and Thursday this seasonexcluding Presidents Week. Pass holders can spread the love too, sharing 50% off a regular-price lift ticket purchased before February 13, usable any day this season. And to celebrate our snowboarding roots, were offering $49 adult snowboard lessons through January 31. With stellar conditions and 7:45AM lift access for everyone on Friday, theres never been a better time to get after it!

Catch you on the slopes!

Safety Tip: Please stop in a safe place where others can see you.

The Ikon Stoke Event is back in action this Friday through Sunday! Expect a full weekend of live music, giveaways, aprs, and early lift access. Friday kicks things off with 7:45AM early lift access and live music at Mid-Mountain, plus $5 pulled pork sandwiches to keep you fueled. Saturday rolls into a pass holder party at Grizzlys with music, raffles, and Ikon swag. The weekend wraps up Sunday with complimentary First Tracks at 7:45AM, exclusively for Ikon Pass holders. Dont forget to enter for your chance to win a 26/27 Ikon Pass and keep the stoke rolling into next season!

Reliable cars are the name of the game; that is why we trust Oliver Subaru and Ford. Made for all seasons and all families, check out Oliver Ford and Oliver Subaru for year-round reliability!

Stay and relish the Green Mountains! Stratton Real Estate is here to help with all your real estate needs. Make your sweet escape a reality.
